Installation Design
Digital Design Studio
METU
Prof. Dr. Arzu Gonenc Sorguc
Fall 2012

Individual

This project is an early practice of my algorithmic design by using Grasshopper 3D as the generetive tool. The main idea was to get the sheltering strips form by the movement paths of a default user. Juxtaposing paths functined as the data source to attract the surface ponits. However, some inquiries regarding graphical mapping (graphs are shown below) of data, determined the main surface.

The formation process
Data mapping by a Bezier graph
Mapping by a Conic graph
Mapping by a Linear graph
